name: Deepesh Raghaw
description: Deepesh Raghaw is a SEBI registered Investment Adviser and a management graduate from IIM-Lucknow. He writes for leading business publications regularly, runs a personal finance blog and a financial planning firm at www.PersonalFinancePlan.in. He can be reached at deepesh.raghaw[AT]gmail.com.
